entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
